sentences.sentence: Normal occlusion of porta hepatis can reduce blood loss effectively after liver resecting.
sentences.translation: 肝门正常闭塞可有效减少肝切除术后的失血。

sentences.sentence: Plan your levels to benefit from Occlusion culling.
sentences.translation: 计划你的关卡，受益于遮挡剔除。

sentences.sentence: Spread: this value sets the level of diffusion of the occlusion.
sentences.translation: 传播：这个数值设置遮挡的扩散级别。
